listing.listing_description:
This spectacular luxury villa near Saint-Rémy-de-Provence amid olive groves on an expansive, exquisitely landscaped estate in the piedmont of Les Alpilles. With panoramic views of the surrounding countryside including Mont Ventoux and the Luberon massif, the traditional mas estate provides sublime serenity within minutes of Eygalieres. Extraordinary alfresco living and dining spaces, 300 square meters of elegant living space, and five deluxe bedrooms sleeping ten guests compose an enchanting setting for unforgettable reunions with family and friends.

Nestled amid six acres of olive orchard, fields of rosemary and lavender, and laurel groves, Mas des Cypress invites you to dreamy days and evenings in the exquisite light and air of Southern France. Play in the glittering swimming pool and sip cool refreshments on stylish sun loungers. Enjoy an alfresco meal in the beautiful, poolside pavilion. Multiple lounge areas with sumptuous furnishings and elegant parasols set the stage for cocktails parties and receptions, while lush lawns shaded by olive and cypress trees create a memorable tableau for memorable weddings and ceremonies.

Indoors, a cavernous great room with soaring ceilings and exposed wood beams is ideal for festive evenings together. Drink fine French wine on superb sofas, opening the glass doors on warm evenings to invite the fragrant air inside. Prepare fabulous feasts in the fully equipped kitchen and gather around the adjoining dining table under vaulted ceilings and the gorgeous chandelier. At night, cuddle up in the cozy and spacious media room with your favorite films. Throughout the villa, superb original artwork and naturalistic detail harmonize Provencal rusticity with modern French elegance.

All of the villa's bedrooms feature two twin beds that can be combined into kings. The beautiful master suite features a four-poster bed and adjoining lounge with doors to the garden; its ensuite bathroom features a stunning marble tub and stand-alone shower.

Mas des Cypress will slake your thirst for exquisite solitude and serenity, while placing you in the heart of one of France's richest regions for natural beauty and cultural depth. Saint-Remy is just over ten kilometers away, while the Roman and papal splendor of Avignon is just thirty-five kilometers. Proximity to the cities and airports of Nime and Marseille make Mas des Cypress an excellent choice for destination wedding guests.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
This beautiful Tuscan villa is located within the Castelfalfi Resort about an hour outside Florence. Secluded amid verdant countryside dotted with hamlets and lush groves, the villa features ample alfresco living areas, exquisite interiors, and four bedrooms suites accommodating eight guests. With the resort's golf course and spa nearby, Angiola is an ideal vacation rental for family reunions, destination wedding guests, and groups of friends seeking authentic Tuscan charm in a private but convenient setting.

The single-level house with classic terracotta roof tile sets the stage for savoring the exquisite Tuscan light. A sparkling blue swimming pool invites you for a morning swim, while the large dining area beneath a pergola is ideal for alfresco meals. Gather in the covered veranda with sumptuous lounge areas for afternoon refreshments, and climb the spiral stairs to the roof lawn to watch the sunset.

Indoors, a spacious great room with vaulted wood ceilings, gorgeous iron chandelier, and stone hearth invites you to drinks by the fire and feasts at the table for eight. On warmer evenings, open the French doors to the terrace and let the house breathe the fragrant air. The adjoining kitchen is fully equipped with chef-grade appliances, providing a dream setting for the chefs among you. If you require private time for work or study, the villa features an office.

Each of the four bedroom suites opens to the terrace, with lovely doors and windows illuminating each room with morning brightness and a serene afternoon glow. Two of the bedrooms enjoy ensuite bathrooms, while the other two share a Jack & Jill bathroom between them.

The Castelafi Resort includes a top-shelf hotel, a 27-hole golf course, and an enchanting spa. Beyond its gates, you're an hour's journey from Florence and 55 kilometers to Pisa. Be sure to visit the splendid hamlet of Montaione, less than twelve kilometers away.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
This spectacular chalet is situated in the heart of Gstaad, within walking distance (about 800 meters) of its world-class slopes. Part of a community development with a shared entertainment room, gym, and spa, the villa offers a superb balance of resort-style convenience and well-appointed privacy. Exquisite artisanal woodworking throughout the villa evokes the rich charm of the Swiss Alps, while high-end appliances for cooking and relaxation inspire utter comfort during your stay. With over 4,000 square feet of interior and exterior living space and flexible accommodations for fourteen guests (including multiple bunk beds), Luxury Gstaad is an ideal choice for families and large groups of friends.

The open-plan living and dining area provides the perfect venue for après-ski enjoyments. An ample lounge area faces the wood-burning fireplace, with twin sectional sofas and lovely banquettes flanking the hearth. There is a small dining table for four in this main room, while the eat-in kitchen features a table for eight. The kitchen is fully equipped with top-of-the-line appliances for the contemporary gourmet. A cozy media room with large TV is perfect for laid-back fun.

The community's shared facilities possess the quality of a five-star hotel. Just steps from your chalet, the capacious entertainment room boast a home theater, bar, and large sitting and dining areas. The fabulous wellness spa includes a voluminous hot tub, steam room, and gym.

The villa's master suite is located on the ground level, opening to the terrace, and features a sumptuous king bed. The king guest suite and kid-friendly bunk room both open to the gardens, while the third guest suite features a queen bed and beautiful mountain views. All of the suites enjoy deluxe ensuite bathrooms with heated towel racks among other accouterments. Your chalet also includes a second bunk room (with four beds) and a king bed for additional guests.

The ideal position of Luxury Gstaad places you in the very heart of this jewel of Switzerland, within steps of the ski slopes and some of the finest dining and nightlife in the Alps. You're also just three kilometers from Schönried.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Reach into the pristine heart of Portugal’s Atlantic coast at this private villa within Quinta da Comporta. A boutique wellness resort designed by architect Miguel Câncio Martins, the Quinta is a celebration of the region’s cultural and natural heritage, as well as a microcosm of Comporta’s unique luxury lifestyle. Your rental includes a private pool and access to the resort’s top-class amenities, while the sands of Pego and Carvalhal are just minutes away.

The home’s design honors the rustic elegance of Comporta, with furniture and decor crafted from traditional bumho and vime. Nestled amid the sandy seaside landscape, its luminous spaces open to sweeping views of rice fields and the resort’s gardens. The symmetrical structure features 2 ground-floor suites flanking the central living area and pool, crowned by an upstairs master suite with balcony. Try your hand at Portuguese cuisine in the fully equipped kitchen, and sip the region’s wines by the wood-burning fireplace.

Comporta’s natural riches have been protected passionately over the generations, offering an almost primordial sanctuary for travelers and celebrities in need of escape. One of its most prominent transplants is the French gardener and landscape designer Louis Albert Broglie, responsible for the Quinta’s bio-gardens. The resort’s unique spa offers replenishing treatments extracted from locally cultivated rice, while its restaurant, bar, and wine cellar showcase the region’s unique flavors. Enjoy ocean swimming and beachfront dining at Praia do Pego, and experience some of Iberia’s finest restaurants in Comporta town.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Observe the pale pink stone of this lovely villa and see how it softens more and more as the sunsets. It features a grand view of the sea and the Aeolian Islands. It is located on the Tyrrhenian coast, near the seaside resort of Capo D’Orlando. Sit on the terrace and pool area of this elegant formal villa sharing antipasti and Pinot Grigio with friends, while admiring the compelling sea view.

Shiny marble floors, antiques, a sweeping staircase, oriental carpets, large urns, delicate ironwork, and ornate crystal chandeliers create the elegant formal atmosphere of the Estella villa. The terrace has a unique swimming pool with hydromassage and of course, overlooks the sea.

The evenings mean entertaining. Candles lit, wines breathing, and the chef is busy in the open kitchen next to the formal dining room. Everyone is dressing before the guests arrive, and aperitifs poured. Restaurants, beaches, tennis courts, cafes are all within 3km. Explore Tindari, one of the last Greek colonies in Sicily. Just east of the point at Capo D’Orlando is Spiaggia San Gregorio, where turquoise water ebbs and flows onto a stunning beach. Best wines and food try Enoteca Collova.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Find one of the best addresses in London for local character and convenience at The Citrine Suite. Tucked into this upscale historic neighbourhood just north of Piccadilly (and Buckingham Palace!), this vacation rental puts shopping and dining at your doorstep and other attractions within a short drive. Its four bedrooms are ideal for a family holiday in the city or a getaway with friends.

Reach this penthouse-level suite by private elevator, then enjoy a glass of wine on the balcony or relax in front of the TV and Wi-Fi. For your comfort and convenience, the apartment has a security system, laundry facilities, and both heating and air conditioning.

An elegantly panelled foyer leads from the entrance of this luxury property to a spacious open-plan living and dining room and an equally generous great room. Warm wood floors, large windows and designer furnishings make the living and dining room sunny and inviting. The great room features its own sitting area, dining area and fully equipped kitchen.

The Citrine Suite has three bedrooms with king beds and one with two twin beds; all four have en-suite bathrooms. Built-in cabinets and dressing tables, neutral tones and spacious layouts give the bedrooms a polished look and a restful feel; in the bathrooms, tiles in cream and tan continue the serene vibe.

If sightseeing is on your to-do list, you’ll appreciate the short walk to the Victoria & Albert Museum and Hyde Park, and the short drive to Buckingham Palace, Westminster Abbey and Big Ben. Don’t miss the chance, however, to explore the neighbourhood, where you can browse the departments of Harrods, shop for everything from gourmet deli items to designer fashions, and sit down to a family-friendly meal at a bistro or a honeymoon-worthy dinner at a Michelin-starred restaurant.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.
